content.p: Associate Professor, Faculty of Engineering Dr. Choong has over 20 years of experience in civil engineering. Prior to joining the university, Dr. Choong worked in engineering consultancy firms, in both the design office and construction sites. He has gained his experiences in the field of water resources including irrigation, urban drainage, river engineering and flood mitigation. His research interests include engineering education, rainfall-runoff, sustainable construction. Hydrologic frequency analysis - assessment of impact of climate change, rainfall pattern and trend.
